resp = client.indices.create(
    index="bicycles",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "cycle_type": {
                "type": "constant_keyword",
                "value": "bicycle"
            },
            "name": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.create(
    index="other_cycles",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "cycle_type": {
                "type": "keyword"
            },
            "name": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)
